data.title: Yul Edochie Celebrates Father, Pete Edochie With Emotional Words On His Birthday
data.meta_description: Nollywood legend and veteran, Pete Edochie has gotten warm words of appreciation and celebration from his son, Yul Edochie on the occasion of his 75th
data.text:
Nollywood legend and veteran, Pete Edochie has gotten warm words of appreciation and celebration from his son, Yul Edochie on the occasion of his 75th birthday anniversary.

Naija News reports Pete Edochie was born on March 7, 1947, and he is the biological father of Yul who is also an actor and politician.

Taking to his Twitter account on Monday to celebrate his father’s birthday, Yul said his 75-years-old dad is the most handsome and he couldn’t have asked for a better father.

He went ahead to describe the older Edochie as a strong man and a legend while praying to God to give him more great years.

Below is what he wrote as he shared a picture of them together.

“The most handsome 75yr old man alive. My man. I couldn’t have asked for a better father.

“Strong man. Legend.

“Happy 75th birthday to you Dad. Chief Pete Edochie. @peteedochie (MON) Ebubedike 1 of Africa.

“Wish you many more great years. May God be with you always.

“Love you Dad.”

In other news, Nollywood actor, Yul Edochie has called on top celebrities to support the popular gospel singer, Chinedu Nwadike who has been diagnosed with chronic Kidney disease.

Naija News reports that the Imo State indigene cried out for help after he was admitted to the Zenith Medical Centre Abuja.

The Nollywood actor via his Instagram page pleaded with their colleagues to help raise the funds the popular singer needed for his treatment.
